thread.title: Ex-NIMASA DG, Akpobolokemi attacks female journalist at court premises
thread.title_full: Ex-NIMASA DG, Akpobolokemi attacks female journalist at court premises

author: Tony
title: Ex-NIMASA DG, Akpobolokemi attacks female journalist at court premises
text:
Home » News » Ex-NIMASA DG, Akpobolokemi attacks female journalist at court premises Ex-NIMASA DG, Akpobolokemi attacks female journalist at court premises On 3:20 pm In News by Tony Comments 
Ex-Director-General of the Nigerian Maritime Administration and Safety Agency (NIMASA), Patrick Akpobolokemi has, in a video footage trending on the social media threatened to slap a female journalist in the premises of the federal high court, Lagos. 
The female reporter who was taking snapshots at the court premises had her device pushed away by the ex-DG who went ahead to say he would slap her. 
Recall that Akpobolokemi is standing trial for alleged corruption filed against him by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC. [BREAKING] Ex-DG of NIMASA, Patrick Akpobolokemi who is undergoing trial 4 FRAUD attacks a female reporter within court premises! @Ayourb pic.twitter.com/272yqHuDzT 
— APC United Kingdom (@APCUKingdom) 1 February 2017 Tony
